review: We've been very pleased with this so far (about two weeks).  The interface is easy and intuitive though it would be better if it were more customizable.  My only issues with it so far is storage space and heat.  The space issue was caused by a driving game that downloaded 1.3 GB.  Sure, it is an unusually large game but I would have thought the device would have at least 64-128 GB of storage space.  The heat is only a concern because I have mine in a cabinet.  There is plenty of open air around the device but, when combined with the heat from the other devices, the cabinet air gets surprisingly hot.  The device itself is strikingly hot to the touch.
author: Michael Friddell

review: I buy a lot of products from Amazon and am largely pleased with most everything I've purchased.  I don't think I've ever written a negative comment before, but this devise was a significant let down and I replaced it quickly with my old Apple TV.  The Netflix app is terrible; its unreliable, gives poor picture quality and doesn't have nearly the features as the Apple TV.Amazon is a great store and I really value it, but if this is what they're going to manufacture and market then I fear they're going to lose some customers who may not come back.
